## Scenario Concept
Provide a clear description of the scenario you'd like to see added.

## Scenario Theme
What is the core business challenge or market condition this scenario represents?

## Difficulty Level
- [ ] Beginner (Easy)
- [ ] Intermediate (Medium)
- [ ] Advanced (Hard)
- [ ] Expert (Very Hard)

## Key Challenges
What specific business challenges should players face in this scenario?

### Economic Factors
- GDP Growth: [e.g., High, Low, Volatile]
- Inflation: [e.g., Stable, Rising, Hyperinflation]
- Interest Rates: [e.g., Low, High, Variable]

### Market Conditions
- Competition Level: [e.g., Low, Moderate, Intense, Monopoly]
- Demand Patterns: [e.g., Stable, Seasonal, Volatile, Declining]
- Entry Barriers: [e.g., Low, Moderate, High]

### Business Constraints
- Starting Resources: [e.g., Limited, Moderate, Abundant]
- Regulatory Environment: [e.g., Lax, Moderate, Strict]
- Technology Requirements: [e.g., None, Moderate, High-tech]

## Learning Objectives
What business concepts or strategies should this scenario teach?

## Duration Estimate
How many rounds should this scenario typically last?
- [ ] Short (5-8 rounds)
- [ ] Medium (9-12 rounds)
- [ ] Long (13-15 rounds)
- [ ] Variable (depends on player decisions)

## Success Criteria
What metrics define success in this scenario?

## Inspiration
What real-world business situations inspired this scenario?

## Implementation Notes
Any specific implementation considerations or requirements?

## Alternative Versions
